item.title: From bad to worse for Puma Biotechnology
item.author: Peter Green,
item.description: If you want a good example of how volatile biotechnology stocks can be, look no further than Puma Biotechnology Inc. This cancer-focused biotechnology company was founded 8 years ago and went public in 2012 with shares trading around $10 per share. In 2014 that share price rocketed to +$260 â€¦
